tool_description: Calculates optimal reorder points based on demand forecasts, lead times, and desired service levels to minimize stockouts.

product_sku.description: Product SKU to calculate reorder point for

lead_time_variability.description: Standard deviation of lead time in days

error_messages: Invalid demand parameters: average_daily_demand must be positive and demand_variability must be non-negative.
Invalid lead time parameters: lead_time_days must be positive and lead_time_variability must be non-negative.
Invalid service level: service_level must be between 0.80 and 0.99.
Calculation error: Unable to compute reorder point with provided parameters. Check for extreme values.
usage: Provide product_sku, demand statistics (average and variability), lead time statistics, and desired service_level to calculate optimal reorder point.

safety_stock_component.description: Safety stock portion of the reorder point

stockout_probability.description: Probability of stockout with this reorder point
